as fast as they

And so there has to be

2560.67.text:
The view we've

2564.17.text:
want to be a political

2568.61.text:
this idea of using business

2571.55.text:

2574.74.text:

that we need business to

2583.21.text:
that we have because business

2588.71.text:
you can get behind the idea that
what better tool than business

2593.34.text:
and free markets to solve some

2597.90.text:
And so the approach we try
to take to public policy

2604.13.text:
Let's do everything we can

to make sure that
businesses that actually

2608.62.text:
care about creating impact have
the same ability to compete.

2612.66.text:
So we've gotten legislation

2616.06.text:
actually created this corporate

It's basically a legal

And the reason for doing

2626.15.text:
a huge impediment to
businesses is being able

2628.24.text:
to scale, which was

2633.32.text:

Well, if that's true, then

to choose to consider

It's like actual legal

And so on the

we've tried to attack issues

I think there are some
